short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension was created to help people focus.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing surf! 

surf plays on the social media trends of Gen-Z and allows you to open up a video game screen that plays a captivating 3-5 minute long clip that you can replay anytime you open up a task. 

With this extension, simply click on your bookmarked tabs and open up a side window to run an immersive focus experience. Based on the popular Tik Tok algorithm and trends, surf allows you to concentrate on meetings, studying, videos, assignments, and virtually anything else on your screen!

"It actually helped me focus, Tik Tok has something right."

"This is actually hilarious, I can't believe this exists."

Try it out for yourself and report back!
